## Load in Data

```{r load-data}
data_orig <- data.table::fread(
  here::here(file.path("data", "sonoma-data-all.csv"))
) |> 
  tibble::as_tibble()
data_orig
```

```{r}
sum(is.na(data_orig))
```

```{r}
data_cleaned <- dsiplib::clean_na_cols(data_orig, clean_mode = "impute_mean")
```

```{r}
sum(is.na(data_cleaned))
```
```{r}
data_cleaned
```



## Including Plots

You can also embed plots, for example:

```{r pressure, echo=FALSE}
plot(pressure)
```

Note that the `echo = FALSE` parameter was added to the code chunk to prevent printing of the R code that generated the plot.
